item.title: Trump 2nd term live updates: 'Some disturbance' possible from tariffs, Trump says
item.description: Trump was asked on how much economic disturbance he is willing to accept as a result of his tariff policy, and how long Americans should expect things...

item.title: Trump threatens Russia with sanctions, tariffs until ceasefire with Ukraine
item.description: President Donald Trump said he would turn up the heat on Russia to seek a deal that would end its war with Ukraine.

item.title: WATCH: Dog is excited to help plumber fix sink
How job cuts at NOAA could impact weather forecasting
item.description: More than 580 NOAA and National Weather Service staffers have already been dismissed as part of government agency cuts, with more possible.
